Title: Tales of the Black Freighter
Writer: Alex Tse, Zack Snyder, Dave Gibbons (based on the graphic novel "Watchmen" co-created by)
Actors: Gerard Butler, Jared Harris, Lori Tritel, Siobhan Flynn
Plot: A mariner survives an attack from the dreaded pirates of the Black Freighter, but his struggle to return home to warn it has a horrific cost.
